analysis: The documents consist of executive orders that delegate presidential authority to various government officials, including the Secretary of State, Secretary of the Interior, Secretary of Energy, Civil Service Commission, and the Administrator of the Agency for International Development. The orders cover a range of topics, including economic opportunity, internal revenue, energy security, government employment security, hostage relief, international organizations, silver certificates, cultural exchange, foreign assistance, and Native American land rights.
title: Delegation of Presidential Authority to Government Officials
